MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the SY22 postcode area of Llanfyllin. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:21pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a fault on the electrical network. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 5:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:41PM on 12th April 2021.
